price: Isaan warra yeroo miidhaan isaan qunname (haqaan) haaloo bahataniidha.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
